label: 道跡考
本: Sand and Pebbles: The Tales of Mujû Ichien, A Voice for Pluralism in Kamakura Buddhism . State University of New York Press . 1985
説明文: Religious Traces, a work by Tainin (1705-1786), is largely a composite from Mujū's writings and other works relevant to his life, and the dating is sometimes questionable (p. 285).　[諦忍]
